level.name: level19.xml
level.comment: looks interesting, but isn't playable

level.name: jungle1.xml
level.comment: boring, paralax scrolling hotspots don't show up and it looks like something is missing in this level.

level.name: level13.xml
level.comment: some solids are not solid, should be playable beside that. interesting

level.name: level7.xml
level.comment: not really playable, looks interesting, but screen to small

level.name: level2.xml
level.comment: needs action fixing, a bit boring beside that

level.name: level3.xml
level.comment: boring

level.name: jungle2.xml
level.comment: level looks boring, the basic idea is ok, but needs fixing and improvements.

level.name: jungle-crisscross-timpany.xml
level.comment: good idea, but a bit short, also its quit obvious due to the limited actions. Not sure why we have climbers here.

level.name: jungle-airline-timpany.xml
level.comment: you can simply bash through the right wall and finish the level, doesn't look like that was intented, needs fixing

level.name: aliens1-phil.xml
level.comment:
not sure if it was really indented, but its extremly hard to get the pingus at the start saved, it is possible to build bridges to catch them at ~40 out, but that requires quite preciese timing. Seperating a single pingu to build the rest will also require a bit of timing, but is still possible. The real hard part is to build the final bridge to the exit, since one will easily run out of bridges there. Anyway if timing is correctly this level is solveable, but it might require quite a few retries.
level is to small and interfers with the GUI elements.

level.name: aliens4-phil.xml
level.comment: Hm, don't like this one, spikes in the air don't look really good, maybe the trap should be replaced with something else.

level.name: large1.xml
level.comment: unplayable test level

level.name: Lev4.xml
level.comment: small and simple level, not to difficult, feels good. fixme: has some solid objects which shouldn't be solid

level.name: am_nil-luki.xml
level.comment: unplayable test level

level.name: lonely.xml
level.comment: the obvious solution isn't the correct one, but on a second guess one should be able to solve this level. a bit short, but otherwise good.

level.name: intensiv-timpany.xml
level.comment: [Output] PingusResource:(datafile: global, res_name: Hotspots/signposts/e):-404-:Resource Hotspots/signposts/e not found. [Output] PingusResource:(datafile: global, res_name: Hotspots/signposts/w):-404-:Resource Hotspot

level.name: industrial1-grumbel.xml
level.comment: unplayable test level

level.name: industrial2-grumbel.xml
level.comment: actions need tuning and levels needs a bit of fixing, but close to be playable

level.name: industrial3-grumbel.xml
level.comment: short and simple, probally a good introduction in using the switchdoor

level.name: industrial4-grumbel.xml
level.comment: unplayable currently, but with a bit of fixing could be playable

level.name: industrial-plumber-timpany.xml
level.comment: doesn't use the industrial background, but might be playable, not tested

level.name: Stair.xml
level.comment: head collision makes this level unplayable, needs fixing (should be playable beside that)

level.name: crystal1.xml
level.comment: historical level, one of the first ones. its playable, but not really exiting.

level.name: crystal2.xml
level.comment: introduction level for the blocker, very easy animated background does currently not work.

level.name: crystal3.xml
level.comment: unfinished level, needs fixing to become playable

level.name: crystal5.xml
level.comment: simple and not to difficult intro in skipping traps via jumps

level.name: crystal-phil1.xml
level.comment: I don't like the traps that fly in the air or in the ground, looks ugly. The basic idea to cross two bridges is cool, but the surrounding could be better and less random due to the invisible traps.

level.name: space1.xml
level.comment: level needs to be lifed so it doesn't block with GUI, actions needs limitation.

level.name: space2.xml
level.comment: To much randomness in the level solving, to many actions

level.name: space4-grumbel.xml
level.comment: to many actions and not enough space on the left, beside that ok

level.name: space-9-tom.xml
level.comment: freeing the blocker to get 30 saved is a bit hard, beside that not that difficult, but fun. has some stuckyness problems, due to the shape of the groundpieces.

level.name: space-loop-timpany.xml
level.comment: might have become unplayable due to the jumper bouncing, needs more testing

level.name: space-phil1.xml
level.comment: unfinished test level

level.name: sept-aztec1-mw.xml
level.comment: lack of space between level and GUI elements makes it unplayable

level.name: sept-cave1-mw.xml
level.comment: uses ugly groundpieces

level.name: hellmouth2-grumbel.xml
level.comment: nice level, it looks like it has multiple solution, but only one is the right one.

level.name: hellmouth3-grumbel.xml
level.comment: just using all the bridgers will be enough to reach the exit

level.name: hellmouth9-grumbel.xml
level.comment: has some stucky bugs, but beside that it looks playable.

level.name: bombing.xml
level.comment: has stucky problems and getting the bridge cutted correctly is a bit hard, beside that its very good

level.name: rockhopping.xml
level.comment: a bit boring

level.name: stone5-grumbel.xml
level.comment: looks good, solution is easy, but due to bridger/builder problems this level gets harder than necesarry and requires a bit try&error, needs fixing

level.name: bridger-tutorial-grumbel.xml
level.comment: Level needs more warning time so that player can look around and figure out what to do, currently pingus fall into dead two meters away from the entranc.
